text: Sphenodesme pierrei Dop PDA (1915 [1914 publ. 1915]) Bull. Soc. Bot. France 61: 317. is the accepted nameThe Plant List: Sphenodesme pierrei of a species of small liana in the genus Sphenodesme (family Lamiaceae). This species is found in southern Vietnam, where it may be called bội tinh Pierre. ==References== Phạm Hoàng Hộ (2003) Cây Cỏ Việt Nam: an Illustrated Flora of Vietnam vol. II (entry: 7401) publ. Nhà Xuẩt Bản Trẻ, HCMC, VN. ==External Links== * * Category:Lamiaceae Category:Flora of Vietnam
title: Sphenodesme pierrei
